nodes.title: Cloud Native Database for Apache CouchDB

product.summary: A NoSQL database that stores schemaless JSON documents
A scalable, high-performance, open source NoSQL database

overview.overview: CouchDB is a terrific single-node database that works just like any other database behind an application server of your choice.

highlights: Pre-configured, one-click to deploy on Cloud Server
All codes on your server, secure and customizable
Paid image, free professional support for your business

childMarkdownRemark.html: This is a repackaged Apache CouchDB® with professional support for your business. Apache CouchDB® is a terrific single-node database. Apache CouchDB® works just like any other database behind an application server of your choice.

faq.value: The default maximum number of connections to CouchDB is 2048.
